name: Suspicious Chimney
description:
Suspicious Chimney is a simple game made from scratch in 72 hours using C++ and SDL2 for a Christmas coding challenge. The full source code can be found at the project's github repository.

How to Play

Move around with either A and D, or the arrow keys. You can attack using Space or F. To use the special attack, hold S when attacking. Try to get the highest score you can!
